snippet: In a letter to Clearwire’s board, Sprint Nextel said Dish Network’s tender offer of $4.40 a share was not “actionable,” since it broke an existing shareholder agreement at the wireless network operator.
abstract: In a letter to Clearwire’s board, Sprint Nextel said Dish Network’s tender offer of $4.40 a share was not “actionable,” since it broke an existing shareholder agreement at the wireless network operator.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Sprint Says Dish's Bid for Clearwire Violates Delaware Law
